Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with plasmids encoding wild-type or mutant LRRK2 (G2019S or R1441C).

Readout description.Result Description: The G2019S variant showed a 3-fold increase in kinase activity compared to wild-type.
The R1441C variant exhibited a 50% reduction in kinase activity compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was measured in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2-expressing cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity within 10% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity deviating by more than 20% from wild-type levels.
